website_summaries.verdict: A complete snare kit for practice and performance. The stand is stable and sturdy and comes with quality accessories.
pros: Comes complete with all you need to get started on the snare
Includes 10 lug 14-inch metal snare, double-braced stand for extra stability, a pair of sticks, a practice pad to mute the drum head, and carry case for all of the above
cons: The carry case is of a lower quality than other brands

customer_reviews.title: Good value - for practice only
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 4, not compared to other snares, but just on it's value. If you know how to tune and/or dampen a snare (or just watch a few youtube videos on how) you can get a decent, non-irritating tone out of this, sufficient for practicing buzz-roll and other rudiments. This would never make a good concert snare, but it's fine for practice. Without tuning and/or dampening, you'll get an irritating metal ringing. I solved this within minutes (to dampen I just applied about a half dozen post-it notes to the batter head).
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Baggynz

customer_reviews.title: Good drum set for my student
customer_reviews.text: My 5th grade daughter needed a snare drum for her band class. I found this student snare drum set to be perfect for her. It has the stand, case, drumsticks, pad, and drum all included. It works great and sounds fine for a student's use. I saved about twenty dollars by buying it used through Amazon Warehouse, and it appeared to be brand new. I'm happy with it this purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chung

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke day 1
customer_reviews.text: It's only day 1. Drum seems fine for my 4th grader just starting out. However, the drum bag zipper broke off on day 1. This is the zipper on top of bag that holds legs. I don't see option to contact seller other than returning entire drum, which I don't want to do. Just need bag replacement
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal goo quality Drum!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality drum. The price is what attracted me to it. I needed on for my daughters band and the local store was so expensive that I searched Amazon for it and Boom! There it was! What a great find! The drum comes with a case and drum stick. It also has the rubber pad to put on the drum to muffle to sound. This is a great quality set. I do wish the case had wheels but you can buy a case on Amazon too. Still cheaper than the local music store.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Cava

customer_reviews.title: Worth EVERY Cent (so far so good!)
customer_reviews.text: I just received this drum and for the price I have 2 say, it's pretty GREAT!!! So far so good , like I said just got it and have been playing on it for over an hour. Def worth price! My drum kit is in storage so I'm itchy to play w/out paying a fortune until I get my real set. For a child or adult getting into drumming this is ur practice piece
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great drum set for starting out
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in 4th grade and wanted a snare drum to play in school. This was perfect. It is smaller than I expected, She can definitely carry it around herself in the case that comes with it. With that said, this drum is not tiny or really light. She is able to keep it at school which helps with space and her commute to school.
customer_reviews.author: jvalit

customer_reviews.title: The drum itself is fine, but I didn't consider the case when making ...
customer_reviews.text: The drum itself is fine, but I didn't consider the case when making this purchase for my son to use St school. Packing it back and forth for a whole year was not ideal. Fortunately he's able to leave it at school this year. It seems to be holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: T&L Bourbo

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I like the item for what little use I got out of it because I bought it as a gift. However, the recipient was over-joyed. That made me happy. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C. Gilmer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about the reviews on the bag but it's actually nicer than I thought it would be(no mildew). Drum seems fine for a 12 year old just started taking lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I wish it sounded better. The sound is very tinny even with proper ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it sounded better. The sound is very tinny even with proper tuning. The included sticks are lightweight garbage, definitely get a better pair. The price is appropriate for the overall quality

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product and quality. My son loves. This is his first one and for school band but will be able to use long term.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: Not a Ludwig, but when I tuned it, it had a nice, sharp, crisp snare drum sound to it!

customer_reviews.title: I think it is okay but my 4th grader was ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it is okay but my 4th grader was told by his School music teacher it was not suitable, even for practice. We had to rent a higher quality drum set through local music store. He is tall for his age and teacher said there was no way to adjust for his height. Unable to return because past return date. My younger son will use it for play. Expensive for toy.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful

As other reviews indicated, the rubber mat has a strong smell initially, but it goes away after time. I think this is a good drum for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This drum was for my son and he loves it. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because there were no directions on how to tune it or what the little levers are for. Setting it up the stand was basic, but the technical parts to the drum I had no idea. The band teacher helped my son, thank goodness! Overall though, a great deal for the money.

customer_reviews.title: The Drum
customer_reviews.text: My son has not had a chance to play it extensively yet. However, the package arrived as described. The quality is good and it is quite sturdy. The carrying bag and all are very nice. Also comes with a beating pad which I wasnt expecting. This is definitely not a toy. Time for formal lessons.

BTW, I got it for $99, now it looks more expensive.

Case is nice. Stand is a little short for tall kids. Good price if you do not want to sign a contract with the school provider and that is why you're probably reading this.

customer_reviews.title: Forget renting, just buy this set.
customer_reviews.text: My son decided to play the snare this year in 5th grade. I was told what he needed and we looked at renting locally. after finding out that the rental would be about twenty five bucks a month, i searched amazon. So glad I did. For less than a hundred bucks, you get the drum, stand, pack, set of sticks, a case, AND the practice mat which mutes the drum sound so that practice can be done without waking the neighbors. The teacher said the set was just fine for what he was doing and it was the right price. This set deserves 6 stars for the value you get.

By the way, My son Loves it!!

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't beat the price; the cheapest we found. Great starter set for all ages interested in learning to play the drums. We bought this set for our 9 year old son and absolutely love it. It comes with an easy to assemble stand, a set of sticks, a practice pad, a key, and a case. The only reason I gave this item a 4 instead of 5 stars is because it advertised a strap included but we never received one. Although Amazon compensated us for not receiving a strap; we would rather of had the strap.

Item was exactly as described and shipping was fast. We would definitely recommend this to others and would order again from seller.

customer_reviews.title: " The quality really amazed me. With the practice pad applied

My husband even said a girl that played in the high school band with him years ago had the same drum. That made me feel that we had made a great purchase that could last my son many years! Perfect gift and a great price!

Oh, and the rubber pad is a great silenser for when training and you live with your grandma! too bad it doesn't come with straps if you want to martch in a martching band

customer_reviews.text: A drum is a drum is a drum when it comes to my 11 year taking lessons. I could rent a snare for $40 per month or buy one for $80 one time on amazon. It is a perfectly fine drum. I love that is comes with a rubber "mute" and wished me daughter would use the mute more often. :) I would definitely recommend this drum to a parent with kids learning drums.

product_meta.title: GP Percussion SK22 Complete Student Snare Drum Kit
product_meta.description: Style:Snare Drum KitSnare Drum kit is perfect for students. Has what you need to start playing. This kit features a 14 inch metal-shelled snare drum and a double-braced stand. It even comes with a rubber practice pad to mute the drum's sound while your student pactices at home! 10-Lug snare drum measures 14 inches in diameter by 5.5 inches high. Includes wooden drum sticks and a drum key for tuning. All this fits in the included padded, nylon backpack with shoulder straps and carry handle.
